recipesJson.name: “POD ONLY” Wayne’s honeydewwy milk tea (iced)
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: I add 3 drops of ws-23 per 15 ML so one drop per 5 ML . I’m also using flavorahs whipped cream which I accidentally use the first time I ever made his recipe , I never realized it until i went to make this . lol . BUT I think it is amazing this way but you can do anyone you want you can use flavorahs whipped cream you can use FA Cream whipped or you can’t use TFA vanilla bean i i’ve cream . i made this for a juul pod at 50 MG nic salt just to keep in mind for y’all .
